name: Danny Dyer's Aldi Car Park Challenge
name_original: Danny Dyer's Aldi Car Park Challenge
description:
WASD - Steer

SPACE - Brake

My friend James once told me of his dream game idea. "A driving game in an Aldi car park where you get heckled Danny Dyer". He was joking. I took it seriously. 

Try to park your speeding cars into tiny spaces in an Aldi car park all the while being heckled by Danny Dyer. 

This game was made more as a coding challenge. Hence so I'm taking no donations or payments for it. It's also pretty much based on the design of No Break Valet so please please go and buy that game as it's crazy fun.
